name: Caveman School DEMO
description:
"I'm GRUFF the caveman. And I'm going to teach you some maths!"

You find a weird CD in your attic labelled "Caveman School" You port it in, and this is when the FUN begins! When you learn math, here's some tips:

  • Don't use a calculator unless you're really unsure!
  • Have fun!
  • Don't get anything wrong. OR ELSE.

Up and Down arrow keys: Add or take away 1.

W and S keys: Add or take away 10.

Enter your answer by clicking the green tick button!

Inspiration: Baldi's Basics, Sonic's Schoolhouse, I.M. Meen and a few others

Game, coding and visuals: Me

Gruff's voice: Also me

Engine: Turbowarp (don't judge me for using a scratch mod pls)

And that's all, folks!
